definition: category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: Any of various plants of the genus Allium with edible bulbs found growing wild.
sentences.chinese: 野生的葱属众多植物的任何一种，具有可食的球茎。

sentences.english: The present paper reports the chromosome numbers and karyotypes of 4 populations of Allium pratt ii in Sect.
sentences.chinese: 研究了葱属太白韭青海4个居群的染色体数目和核型。

sentences.english: The onion is allied to the lily.
Onion is a term used for many plants in the genus Allium.
sentences.chinese: 洋葱是众多葱属植物的学名。

definition: Cruciferae or Brassicaceae (taxonomic family including Brassica etc whose flowers have a cross of 4 petals)
Umbelliferae or Apiaceae, plant family containing carrot, coriander etc
Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
Amaranthaceae, family of herbaceous plants containing Chinese spinach (Amaranthus inamoenus) 莧菜
Asparagaceae, family of flowering plants which includes asparagus
Labiatae, the taxonomic family including lavender, mint
